DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate analgesic effect oral potassium diclofenac patient proliferative diabetic retinopathy submit retinal photocoagulation . Two group patient follow effect treatment ( diclofenac plus laser ) compare placebo ( placebo plus laser ) . Pain associate treatment record use Visual Analog Scale 15 minute procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Diclofenac Retinal Photocoagulation Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.criteria: 1 ) highrisk proliferative diabetic retinopathy eye 1 ) history prior laser treatment vitrectomy ; 2 ) allergy nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ; 3 ) condition affect comprehension VAS pain score test ; 4 ) Contraindications diclofenac use pregnancy , bleed disorder , asthma , renal failure ; 5 ) use analgesic drug last 24 hour .
